text: Fathi Arafat (; 11 January 1933 â€“ 1 December 2004) was the founder and Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Palestinian Red Crescent. He studied medicine at Cairo University. He is the brother of Yasser Arafat, leader of the Palestine Liberation Organization. == References == Category:1933 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Palestinian politicians Category:Physicians Category:Politicians from Cairo
